resources.string:
WELCOME TO MY SPORTS 
 Your dreams start with us , join sports 
 App and be part of rhe winning team.We are 
 certified by Laikipia university to bring you 
 sports Events within our Campuses 
 as they occur Realtime.

1.HOW TO INSTALL THE APP 
 Make sure you have a working Internet connection 
 Visit Google Play on your phone 
 Search for : My Sports App 
 Hit on the Install Button 

2.APP CONFIGURATION 
 Register first on succesfflul Registration 
 you will Be directed to Login page 
 Where your username and password will be Required 
 Login to access full Features. 

3.APPLICATION USE 

Click on the Hambourg Menu to get Menu items 
 Choose the Activity you are interested in 
 Enroll for the aActivity then wait for 
 a confirmation Text in your Email
I am the Developer Behind This Application \n I have Ten years Experience in Android development \n

LU MARATHON 
 VENUE : Laikipia University.
